room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Fun and entertaining. Kept our group on it's toes and guessing at every turn. Not an easy room to guess your way through. Fun and fast paced. I would recommend as a room to do if you are interested in escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The girls had a great time. Glad they went as a group and booked the whole room. I think for the first time going, a little more instruction would have been helpful. The clock tower is extremely well done and as this was our first escape room, it was not what I expected. The clues are much more involved than I had imagined and really do make you think. Great family or party activity.

room_title: Escape room "The Clock Tower" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our family had a great time trying to escape the clock tower. We had 2 adults, 13, 10, and 6 yr old children participate. Everyone was able to contribute to solving different puzzles. We would like to go again and do the Western Bank Heist.
